text: R. C. Carton (born Richard Claude Critchett, 1853–1928) was a British stage actor and playwright.Goble p.73 ==Selected works== * Liberty Hall (1892) * The Home Secretary (1895) * The Tree of Knowledge (1897) * Lord and Lady Algy (1898) * Mr. Hopkinson (1905) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. title: R. C. Carton
